patch 7.4.1556
Problem:    "make install" changes the help tags file, causing it to differ
            from the repository.
Solution:   Move it aside and restore it.

patch 7.4.1556
Problem:    "make install" changes the help tags file, causing it to differ
            from the repository.
Solution:   Move it aside and restore it.
